name: FORTELLER (itch)
description:
Play as a witch and place cards on the board.
The cards you place and in what order you choose to place them will alter the polarity between Fortune and Misfortune. Attempt to determine the cards inherent qualities and explore the stories of every character.
Every playthrough has 3 Scenes. Each Scene has 3 outcomes. And there are 27 endings.

Have fun. Remember, this game is in playtesting.

Please partake in the survey below!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdBC6BLd6VeYA2Jg2cYPTgujbTFM-1j8GRXPXhH...
